name: Fasty Square
description:
There are four brothers in the square monster family: green, yellow, red and blue. They have different characteristics: some are straightforward, some are mischievous, some are hesitant, some are even duplicitous.

Let's see if you are fasty and smarty enough to catch all of them!

Fasty Square is a cute little casual game that is much more challenging than it appears. Trust me, it will drive you crazy!
